issue.title: rocketnews24.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://rocketnews24.com/2022/04/29/1625267/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Frocketnews24.com%2F2022%2F04%2F29%2F1625267%2F) ### Comment > 広告ブロックが検知され記事の画像を表示できません。AdGuardでホワイトリストに追加しても変わりません。もう一つインストールした広告ブロッカーの280blockerをオフにしてもダメでした。 ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/uomieln.jpg)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard/AdGuard Pro for iOS v4.4.4 Browser: | Safari DNS filtering: | server: `AdGuard DNS`
Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base

AdGuard Annoyances,
AdGuard Cookie Notices,
AdGuard Popups,
AdGuard Mobile App Banners,
AdGuard Other Annoyances,
AdGuard Widgets,
Fanboy's Annoyances,
Web Annoyances Ultralist,
Adblock Warning Removal List,
I don't care about cookies,
EasyList Cookie List,
Dandelion Sprout's Annoyances List Other extensions used: | 280blocker

issue.title: caribou coffee app
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

4.0

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

the problem is with app, not a site

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.caribou.caribouapp

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter, AdGuard Cookie Notices filter, AdGuard Popups filter, AdGuard Mobile App Banners filter, AdGuard Widgets filter, AdGuard Other Annoyances filter, AdGuard DNS filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

@@||device-api.urbanairship.com^$app=com.caribou.caribouapp

@@||remote-data.urbanairship.com^$app=com.caribou.caribouapp

app wont open without these

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body: i tried just one or the other and you need both for app to work

comment.body: @Sergey-Lyapin @jellizaveta Do you have an idea? It seems what's working on Chromium does not work on iOS. `rocketnews24.com,youpouch.com,soranews24.com#%#//scriptlet('prevent-element-src-loading', 'script' ,'_static')` doesn't work even on Chromium.

issue.title: www.24ur.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://www.24ur.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.24ur.com%2F) ### Comment > I have AdGuard home instaled on rasberry pi. I fixed static ip for rasberry pi on my router. > > AdGuard used to work fine responding with 0.0.0.0 to ads. But after some time (days) it stopped working. I was trying to figure out if this was something I did but I rerolled my system settings and even reinstalled my AdGuard on Rasberry pi but to no use it stopped blocking all ads either uTube or others. > > I tried edge and chrome and same thing happens. I find it interesting that after installing AdGuard on my PC which uses AdGuard Basic Filter if I am not mistaken ads are now blocked. > > This however is not what truly want I would like to block ads for my whole LAN and since it worked before there must be something wrong. If you need any further info I will provide. Also I would like to know if I can add this basic filter to my AdGuard Home that would probably block ads on all devices on my LAN but again it should work without this like it has before. > > Thank you and best regards, > > Maj ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/u03ci0D.png)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/5v6rwjr.png)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- Platform: | AdGuard Home Browser: | Chrome Filters: | Other:
AdGuard DNS Other extensions used: | I have no extensions except Google Docs Offline, no antivirus software just windows firewall, no adblockers.

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://open.spotify.com/playlist/21B8PHenGnh8fxFrj0SFG5](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fopen.spotify.com%2Fplaylist%2F21B8PHenGnh8fxFrj0SFG5) ### Comment > 99% of the times AdGuard AdBlocker is blocking those annoying ads in spotify [and they are skipped without interrupting the playing], however, from times to times, they do pop in despite blocking list being up to date [browser is also up to date]. Using the individual 'block ads on this website' option, results in complete stop and the only way to restart the playlist is either to refresh it completely or log out and in again. ### Screenshots

issue.title: eksisozluk.com
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin 1.46.0

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://eksisozluk.com/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Turkish filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

**1. The color code of the autocomplete ad in the search box is incorrect.**

[https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/TurkishFilter/sections/css_extended.txt#L17](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/TurkishFilter/sections/css_extended.txt#L17)

The color code should be "0,0,0" instead of "0, 255, 255":
~~eksisozluk.com#?#.ui-autocomplete > li:has(> div[style="color:rgb(0, 255, 255)"])~~
eksisozluk.com#?#.ui-autocomplete > li:has(> div[style="color:rgb(0, 0, 0)"])


**2. Screenshots**
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>
eksisozluk.com#?#.ui-autocomplete > li:has(> div[style="color:rgb(0, 255, 255)"])

![Screenshot from 2022-12-31 13-54-25](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/81188796/210134167-eedb2c98-24e4-48e7-a07a-c563a4aa2c3a.png)

</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot 2:</summary>
eksisozluk.com#?#.ui-autocomplete > li:has(> div[style="color:rgb(0, 0, 0)"])

![b](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/81188796/210134220-abb8d53c-0db9-4762-a9a6-69fdb5dd7794.png)

</details>

Tested with light and dark theme.

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

issue.title: rocketnews24.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://rocketnews24.com/2022/04/29/1625267/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Frocketnews24.com%2F2022%2F04%2F29%2F1625267%2F) ### Comment > 広告ブロックが検知され記事の画像を表示できません。AdGuardでホワイトリストに追加しても変わりません。もう一つインストールした広告ブロッカーの280blockerをオフにしてもダメでした。 ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/uomieln.jpg)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard/AdGuard Pro for iOS v4.4.4 Browser: | Safari DNS filtering: | server: `AdGuard DNS`
Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base

Annoyances:
AdGuard Annoyances,
AdGuard Cookie Notices,
AdGuard Popups,
AdGuard Mobile App Banners,
AdGuard Other Annoyances,
AdGuard Widgets,
Fanboy's Annoyances,
Web Annoyances Ultralist,
Adblock Warning Removal List,
I don't care about cookies,
EasyList Cookie List,
Dandelion Sprout's Annoyances List Other extensions used: | 280blocker

comment.body: @SKEIDs Pls test `rocketnews24.com,youpouch.com,soranews24.com#%#//scriptlet("abort-on-property-read", "document.createElement")`. If this works, `rocketnews24.com,youpouch.com,soranews24.com#%#//scriptlet('abort-on-stack-trace', 'document.createElement', '_static')` too.
